metadata.description: Estate planning concepts, strategies, and legal instruments

fundamentals.definition: Estate planning is the process of anticipating and arranging for the management and disposal of a person's estate during their life and after death, while minimizing taxes and ensuring assets transfer to intended beneficiaries.
key_objectives: Wealth preservation for current and future generations

will.name: Last Will and Testament
will.purpose: Direct distribution of assets and name guardians for minor children
limitations: Does not cover all assets (beneficiary designations override)

revocable_living_trust.name: Revocable Living Trust (RLT)
revocable_living_trust.purpose: Avoid probate, maintain control, provide for incapacity
revocable_living_trust.funding_requirement: Assets must be titled in trust name to avoid probate

irrevocable_trust.name: Irrevocable Trust
irrevocable_trust.purpose: Tax planning, asset protection, Medicaid planning
key_features: Cannot be modified or revoked (with limited exceptions)
Removes assets from estate for tax purposes

irrevocable_life_insurance_trust.purpose: Remove life insurance from taxable estate

qualified_personal_residence_trust.purpose: Transfer residence at reduced gift tax cost

intentionally_defective_grantor_trust.purpose: Income tax paid by grantor, assets grow tax-free for beneficiaries

spousal_lifetime_access_trust.purpose: Married couples preserve access while removing from estate

financial_poa.name: Financial Power of Attorney
financial_poa.purpose: Authorize agent to manage financial affairs

healthcare_poa.name: Healthcare Power of Attorney / Healthcare Proxy
healthcare_poa.purpose: Authorize agent to make medical decisions

estate_tax.description: Tax on transfer of assets at death
estate_tax.portability: Deceased spouse unused exemption can transfer to surviving spouse
estate_tax.state_estate_taxes: Some states have separate estate taxes with lower exemptions

strategies.annual_exclusion_gifting: Give up to annual exclusion to unlimited recipients
strategies.direct_payment_exclusion: Tuition and medical payments directly to institutions are exempt

generation_skipping_transfer_tax.description: Tax on transfers to grandchildren or younger generations
generation_skipping_transfer_tax.purpose: Prevent skipping estate tax through generation-skipping

income_tax_considerations.step_up_in_basis: Assets receive new cost basis at death, eliminating capital gains

trust_income_taxation.non_grantor_trust: Trust pays tax at compressed rates (highest rate at ~$14,000)

income_tax_considerations.dnr_deduction: Distributable Net Income deduction for trust distributions

asset_protection.definition: Legal strategies to shield assets from creditors and lawsuits

legitimate_planning.timing: Must be done BEFORE creditor claims arise (fraudulent transfer rules)
strategies: Domestic Asset Protection Trusts (DAPTs) - 19+ states allow

fraudulent_transfer_rules.description: Transfers made to defraud creditors can be reversed

considerations: Balance between current spouse and children from prior marriage
QTIP trusts for spousal support while preserving remainder for children

special_needs_trust.purpose: Provide for disabled beneficiary without disqualifying government benefits

types.first_party: Funded with beneficiary's own assets (Medicaid payback required)

special_needs_trust.pooled_trust: Nonprofit manages pooled funds for multiple beneficiaries

special_needs_planning.able_accounts: Tax-advantaged accounts for people with disabilities

considerations: Valuation discounts (minority interest, lack of marketability)

charitable_remainder_trust.purpose: Income stream to donor, remainder to charity

types.crat: Charitable Remainder Annuity Trust - fixed payment
types.crut: Charitable Remainder Unitrust - percentage of value annually

benefits: Avoid capital gains on appreciated assets

charitable_lead_trust.purpose: Income to charity, remainder to family

probate_process.definition: Court-supervised process of validating will and distributing assets
assets_subject_to_probate: Bank accounts in decedent's name alone
assets_avoiding_probate: Joint tenancy with right of survivorship
Community property with right of survivorship
